name: Mystery at Pistis Estate
description:
When you're a little girl and you can't seem to sleep, the home begs to be explored. Little miss at Pistis has felt uneasy about her familial life recently, and it's up to you to find out what happened. Collect all 12 pieces of Ouroboros to fix her grandfather clock.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys - move
  • Space bar - interact

A game in the style of RPGMaker horror, The Mystery at Pistis Estate was written in HTML/JS with Pixi.js rendering and a micro audio player. It was completed in 50 hours for JimJam #2 (Theme: Ouroboros). Art created by me.

Thanks to the curators at freesounds.org for the audio:

  • urupin for chiming clock
  • vampirella17 for the scream
  • 137SOUNDS for the zombie growl
  • inspectorj for the door open
